column4: My tty is distorted once X starts, how do I fix this (by distorted I mean unusable)

unreadable white blocks and heavily distorted text

I have something similar, 40 x 16 characters. I just removed the splash word from the /boot/grub/menu.lst lines starting with kernel. Not a great fix, it removes the startup splash screen, but the console is usable

remove the vga=ask as well, that's trying to bring up the framebuffer.
